pr_title: fix: SQL generation for Date type program variables [DHIS2-8675]

timeline.message: fix: SQL generation for Date type program variables

timeline.body:
```suggestion
        assertEquals( "(select duedate from analytics_event_Program000A where analytics_event_Program000A.pi = ax.pi and duedate is not null and executiondate < cast( '2020-01-02' as date ) and executiondate >= cast( '2020-01-01' as date ) order by executiondate desc limit 1 )",
```
timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                    assertEquals("(select duedate from analytics_event_Program000A where analytics_event_Program000A.pi = ax.pi and duedate is not null and executiondate < cast( '2020-01-02' as date ) and executiondate >= cast( '2020-01-01' as date ) order by executiondate desc limit 1 )",
          
          
            
                    assertEquals( "(select duedate from analytics_event_Program000A where analytics_event_Program000A.pi = ax.pi and duedate is not null and executiondate < cast( '2020-01-02' as date ) and executiondate >= cast( '2020-01-01' as date ) order by executiondate desc limit 1 )",
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
assertEquals("(select duedate from analytics_event_Program000A where analytics_event_Program000A.pi = ax.pi and duedate is not null and executiondate < cast( '2020-01-02' as date ) and executiondate >= cast( '2020-01-01' as date ) order by executiondate desc limit 1 )",
assertEquals( "(select duedate from analytics_event_Program000A where analytics_event_Program000A.pi = ax.pi and duedate is not null and executiondate < cast( '2020-01-02' as date ) and executiondate >= cast( '2020-01-01' as date ) order by executiondate desc limit 1 )",
timeline.author: stian-sandvold
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -146,7 +146,7 @@ public void testDueDate()
         assertEquals("duedate",
             getSql("V{due_date}" ) );
 
-        assertEquals("duedate",
+        assertEquals("(select duedate from analytics_event_Program000A where analytics_event_Program000A.pi = ax.pi and duedate is not null and executiondate < cast( '2020-01-02' as date ) and executiondate >= cast( '2020-01-01' as date ) order by executiondate desc limit 1 )",

timeline.bodyHTML:

getSqlEnrollment("V{due_date}" ) );
